CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Options__r.Name )),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & Options__r.Name,IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Sub_Options__r.Name )),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & Sub_Options__r.Name,IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Land_Activity__r.Name )),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & Land_Activity__r.Name, IF(NOT(ISBLANK( AE_SB__r.Name )),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & AE_SB__r.Name, IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Airline_Upgrade__r.Name )),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & Airline_Upgrade__r.Name, IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Stopover__r.Name)),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & Stopover__r.Name,IF(NOT(ISBLANK( City__r.Name )), City__r.departure_airport_code__c & "-" & City__r.Name,IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Deal__r.Name)),NOT(ISBLANK(Deal__r.title__c ))),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & Deal__r.Name & "-" & Deal__r.title__c,IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Deal__r.Name)),NOT(ISBLANK( Deal__r.title_nz__c))),TEXT(Component_Type__c) & "-" & Deal__r.Name & "-" & Deal__r.title_nz__c,"Information Not Available")))))))))
CustomField.label: Component Short Name
